org.gwtbootstrap3.extras.select.client.ui

Class SelectBase<T>

  • Object
    • UIObject
      • Widget
        • Panel
          • ComplexPanel
            • ComplexWidget
              • SelectBase<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - select value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsEditor<LeafValueEditor<T>>, HasAttachHandlers, HasValueChangeHandlers<T>, HasHandlers, EventListener, TakesValue<T>, Focusable, HasEnabled, HasValue<T>, HasVisibility, HasWidgets, HasWidgets.ForIsWidget, IndexedPanel, IndexedPanel.ForIsWidget, IsWidget, Iterable<Widget>, HasId, HasInlineStyle, HasPull, HasResponsiveness, HasSize<ButtonSize>, HasType<ButtonType>, HasAllSelectHandlers<T>, HasHiddenHandlers, HasHideHandlers, HasLoadedHandlers, HasRefreshedHandlers, HasRenderedHandlers, HasShowHandlers, HasShownHandlers
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultipleSelect, Select

    public abstract class SelectBase<T>
extends ComplexWidget
implements HasValue<T>, HasEnabled, Focusable, HasType<ButtonType>, HasSize<ButtonSize>, IsEditor<LeafValueEditor<T>>, HasAllSelectHandlers<T>
    Bootstrap select widget base
    Author:
    Xiaodong Sun
    See Also:
    http://silviomoreto.github.io/bootstrap-select/

      • setDropupAuto

        public void setDropupAuto(boolean dropupAuto)
        Checks to see which has more room, above or below. If the drop-up has enough room to fully open normally, but there is more room above, the drop-up still opens normally. Otherwise, it becomes a drop-up. If dropupAuto is set to false, drop-ups must be called manually.

        Defaults to true.
        Parameters:
        dropupAuto -

      • setForceDropup

        public void setForceDropup(boolean forceDropup)
        If drop-up auto is set to false, force to make the select a drop-up menu if set to true.
        Parameters:
        forceDropup -
        See Also:
        setDropupAuto(boolean)

      • render

        public void render()
        Force a re-render of the bootstrap-select UI. This is useful if you programmatically change any underlying values that affect the layout of the element.
